attributes.action: instigate a MASSIVE overhaul of the public sector - STOP WASTING OUR MONEY!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too much money is wasted by too many incompetent people working too few hours for their extremely generous Easy Street lifestyles, holidays and final salary pension schemes (funded by private sector workers who also have to fund their own pensions which Mr Brown made even harder to do by taking away tax relief).

It will be hard work, but somebody needs to sort it out instead of continually brushing it under the carpet and asking for more money from the people that can't complain, i.e. the private sector.

Please stop wasting our cash.
